attributes.action: support English shipyards by giving independence to Scotland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many naval ships are built by Scottish shipyards whilst being paid for by the English tax payer. Many shipyards in England / Wales have closed down whilst Scottish shipyards are subsidised by the English taxpayer. However, scottish fishery protection boats are rarely built in England/Wales.
